Blog.post: Yesterday I went to the softball picnic that was fun nope not really and today Im just going to my moms friends house for her kids B-day yea real fun. and then idk well g2g bye Jordan
I am so bored idk what to write. There is nothing to do. Im going swimming at vanessa's. fun. well Im out. Jordan

This weekend was fun. Saturday-went to the St.James fair and did nothign because it was boring. Sunday- I went to the Greatful Dead concert and it was very fun. I had a great time and im glad I went. I even bonded with my dads girlfriend. I didnt smoke no pot becuase people problay think I did but I didnt. I did drink though. That was the only illegal thing I did. And today we just got back at 2 p.m. And then I went to Emilys house with Jensen and Erin and we did nothing becuase my mom was being gay. And today Chris got his new car. Yes. A new pimp moblie. lol, but I went to the mall with Chris and Jensen and Chris and I were looking for our Mario and Luigi hats at lids seeing if we can make them there, but then we ended up not getting them and gettin a SOX hat yea becuase they are better than the cubs, and chris got a A's hat. And we met the fagest guy in radioshack. Man he was gay. As Danny would say Whoa this guy is gay. Well thats it. bye Leave some comments Jordan
Well i just started this thing and today i am going to the saint james fair n shit i am currantly happy and the summer has been going pretty good so far ~Jordan

Well today was very interesting. it was fun though. With Chris,Danny,Emily,and Colleen. It was exciting i would have to say. and basketball was a bitch. but other than that it was fun. we all went swiming at vannessa's yea shes a pimp. fer shur. and Chris and I mak some damn good pancakes. Mario and Luegi all the way leave me some comments ~Jordan

Well today was kind of boring I had open gym at 8 in the morning fun huh nope not at all well it wasent as bad as it usually was, and I had two games, J.V. and Varsity I did ok in both of them. We blew out griffith in the J.V. game. And the Varsity we blew out bishop noll. and after that I went to the fair and talked to a cop and got yelled at fun shit ~Jordan

Today is Serena's birthday so I will be with her.And theres really nothing else to do. Tommorrw im going to the national night out so I can obay the law for at least one night. Yay. Well im out Jordan
